panels.description: Time spent in the Message Routing related deterministic processing phases

targets.expr:
label_replace(
    quantile by (ic_subnet) (
        0.5,
        sum by (ic, ic_node, ic_subnet, instance, job) (rate(mr_process_batch_phase_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance", phase!="execution"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset))
    ),
    "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

panels.title: DSM: Time Spent in Message Routing $comparison_offset ago

panels.description: Time spent in the Message Routing related deterministic processing phases

targets.expr:
label_replace(
    quantile by (ic_subnet) (
        0.5,
        sum by (ic, ic_node, ic_subnet, instance, job) (rate(mr_process_batch_phase_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance", phase!="execution"}[$period])) 
    ),
    "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

panels.title: DSM: Time Spent in Message Routing

panels.description: Median share of deterministic processing cycle consumed by Message Routing related phases

targets.expr:
quantile by (phase) (
    0.5,
    quantile by (ic_subnet, phase) (
        0.5,
        rate(mr_process_batch_phase_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance", phase!="execution"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset) 
       /
        ignoring (phase) group_left sum by (ic, ic_node, ic_subnet, instance, job) (rate(mr_process_batch_phase_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset))
    )
)

panels.title: Share of MR Operations in Processing Cycle $comparison_offset ago

panels.description: Median share of deterministic processing cycle consumed by Message Routing related phases

targets.expr:
quantile by (phase) (
    0.5,
    quantile by (ic_subnet, phase) (
        0.5,
        rate(mr_process_batch_phase_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance", phase!="execution"}[$period]) 
       /
        ignoring (phase) group_left sum by (ic, ic_node, ic_subnet, instance, job) (rate(mr_process_batch_phase_duration_seconds_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]))
    )
)

panels.title: Share of MR Operations in Processing Cycle

panels.description: Checkpointing time per GiB of min(state size, 1GiB). The minimum is clamped at 1GiB to iron out the state-size independent overhead on subnets with small state size.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
max_over_time(quantile by (ic_subnet) (0.5, rate(state_manager_checkpoint_op_duration_seconds_sum{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",op="create"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset)
  /   rate(state_manager_checkpoint_op_duration_seconds_count{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",op="create"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset))[30m:10s]) /
clamp_min(quantile by (ic_subnet) (0.7, state_manager_state_size_bytes{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"} offset $comparison_offset), 1024 * 1024 * 1000) * 1024 * 1024 * 1024,
"ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

panels.title: Checkpointing Time per GiB $comparison_offset ago

panels.description: Checkpointing time per GiB of min(state size, 1GiB). The minimum is clamped at 1GiB to iron out the state-size independent overhead on subnets with small state size.
panels.title: Checkpointing Time per GiB

panels.description:
Manifest Computation Time per GiB of min(delta size,  32MiB). The minimum is clamped at 32MiB to iron out the delta-size independent overhead on subnets with small delta size.

Note that this metrics also considers the fraction of unchanged chunks that are hashed and compared to the original hash as part of the delta.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
max_over_time(quantile by (ic_subnet) (0.5, rate(state_manager_checkpoint_op_duration_seconds_sum{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",op="compute_manifest"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset)
  /
    rate(state_manager_checkpoint_op_duration_seconds_count{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",op="compute_manifest"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset))[30m:10s]) /
clamp_min(max_over_time(sum by (ic_subnet) (increase(quantile by (ic_subnet, type) (0.5, state_manager_manifest_chunk_bytes{job="replica",ic="$ic", type=~"hashed|hashed_and_compared", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet"} offset $comparison_offset)[4m:1s]))[30m:10s]), 32 * 1024 * 1000) * 1024 * 1024 * 1024,
"ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

panels.title: Manifest Computation Time per GiB delta $comparison_offset ago

panels.description:
Manifest Computation Time per GiB of min(delta size,  32MiB). The minimum is clamped at 32MiB to iron out the delta-size independent overhead on subnets with small delta size.

Note that this metrics also considers the fraction of unchanged chunks that are hashed and compared to the original hash as part of the delta.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
max_over_time(quantile by (ic_subnet) (0.5, rate(state_manager_checkpoint_op_duration_seconds_sum{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",op="compute_manifest"}[$period])
  /
    rate(state_manager_checkpoint_op_duration_seconds_count{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",op="compute_manifest"}[$period]))[30m:10s]) /
clamp_min(max_over_time(sum by (ic_subnet) (increase(quantile by (ic_subnet, type) (0.5, state_manager_manifest_chunk_bytes{job="replica",ic="$ic", type=~"hashed|hashed_and_compared", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet"})[4m:1s]))[30m:10s]), 32 * 1024 * 1000) * 1024 * 1024 * 1024,
"ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

panels.title: Manifest Computation Time per GiB delta

panels.description:
The time it takes until a XNet message is inducted on the destination subnet. 

Note that we measure a full roundtrip, i.e., the time until a message is garbage collected based on a signal coming back from the other subnet and divide this by two.

targets.expr:
quantile (0.5,
quantile by(ic_subnet, remote) (
    0.5,
    (rate(mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset) /
    rate(mr_time_in_stream_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset)) > 0
)
/
 (
    1 / (
        quantile by(ic_subnet) (0.5, rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset))
      + on(ic_subnet) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"} offset $comparison_offset)
    )
  +
    1 / (
        quantile by(remote) (0.5, label_replace(rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset), "remote", "$0", "ic_subnet", ".+"))
      + on(remote) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"} offset $comparison_offset)
    )
)
)

max (
quantile by(ic_subnet, remote) (
    0.5,
    (rate(mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset) /
    rate(mr_time_in_stream_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset)) > 0
)
/
 (
    1 / (
        quantile by(ic_subnet) (0.5, rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset))
      + on(ic_subnet) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"} offset $comparison_offset)
    )
  +
    1 / (
        quantile by(remote) (0.5, label_replace(rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset), "remote", "$0", "ic_subnet", ".+"))
      + on(remote) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"} offset $comparison_offset)
    )
)
)

min (
quantile by(ic_subnet, remote) (
    0.5,
    (rate(mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset) /
    rate(mr_time_in_stream_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset)) > 0
)
/
 (
    1 / (
        quantile by(ic_subnet) (0.5, rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset))
      + on(ic_subnet) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"} offset $comparison_offset)
    )
  +
    1 / (
        quantile by(remote) (0.5, label_replace(rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset), "remote", "$0", "ic_subnet", ".+"))
      + on(remote) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"} offset $comparison_offset)
    )
)
)

panels.title: ~ #Rounds until XNet message inducted on target subnet $comparison_offset ago

panels.description:
The time it takes until a XNet message is inducted on the destination subnet. 

Note that we measure a full roundtrip, i.e., the time until a message is garbage collected based on a signal coming back from the other subnet and divide this by two.

targets.expr:
quantile (0.5,
quantile by(ic_subnet, remote) (
    0.5,
    (rate(mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]) /
    rate(mr_time_in_stream_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])) > 0
)
/
 (
    1 / (
        quantile by(ic_subnet) (0.5, rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period]))
      + on(ic_subnet) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"})
    )
  +
    1 / (
        quantile by(remote) (0.5, label_replace(rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period]), "remote", "$0", "ic_subnet", ".+"))
      + on(remote) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"})
    )
)
)

max (
quantile by(ic_subnet, remote) (
    0.5,
    (rate(mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]) /
    rate(mr_time_in_stream_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])) > 0
)
/
 (
    1 / (
        quantile by(ic_subnet) (0.5, rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period]))
      + on(ic_subnet) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"})
    )
  +
    1 / (
        quantile by(remote) (0.5, label_replace(rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period]), "remote", "$0", "ic_subnet", ".+"))
      + on(remote) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"})
    )
)
)

min (
quantile by(ic_subnet, remote) (
    0.5,
    (rate(mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period]) /
    rate(mr_time_in_stream_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period])) > 0
)
/
 (
    1 / (
        quantile by(ic_subnet) (0.5, rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period]))
      + on(ic_subnet) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"})
    )
  +
    1 / (
        quantile by(remote) (0.5, label_replace(rate(artifact_pool_consensus_height_stat{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",job="replica",type="finalization",pool_type="validated",stat="max"}[$period]), "remote", "$0", "ic_subnet", ".+"))
      + on(remote) group_right
        0 * count by(ic_subnet, remote) (mr_time_in_stream_sum{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"})
    )
)
)

panels.title: ~ #Rounds until XNet message inducted on target subnet

targets.expr:
(sum by(ic) (rate(xnet_builder_pull_attempt_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance", status=~"success|NoContent"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset)) /
sum by(ic) (rate(xnet_builder_pull_attempt_count{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"}[$period] offset $comparison_offset)))
